candidates.title: rusk: include changes from rusk-release-1.0.0 branch
core: Add `abi` module
candidates.body:
Move the `abi` module from `rusk-abi` to `core` under a feature flag.

The structs `Metadata` and `Query` are now also under `dusk_core::abi`.
As are the re-exports from `piecrust-uplink`.

The backwards compatibility of these changes has been confirmed with the help of @HDauven and @miloszm

candidates.title: vm: Add dusk-vm
candidates.body:
To help reviewing these changes, I've split up the work into this one and:

- [x] #3239

Resolves #3235

candidates.title: Add minimum deployment gas points setting
candidates.body:
Adds minimum deployment gas points setting, 
enforces a minimum cost for contract deployment even if the contract size is small.
Protects network from spamming with a large number of small contracts.

Implements a top priority #3210

candidates.title: vm: Add a transaction execution function
candidates.body:
In order to move `execute` to our `vm` some contract-deployment functionalities had to move as well:
- the calculation of the bytecode charge is now a method of `dusk_core::transfer::Transaction.deploy_charge`
- the verification of the stored bytecode hash can now be done via the method `dusk_core::transfer::data::Bytecode.verify_hash`
- generating a contract id can now be done via `dusk_core::abi::gen_contract_id`

Resolves #3185
